old:
らっしゃい！
気に入ったのがあったら
買ってってくれよな！
column2:
Rasai!
If you like what you see, you can buy it at
, right?

old:
森は発見も多いが危険も多い
行くなら十分準備してけよな！
column2:
There's a lot to discover in the forest, but there's also a lot of danger.
If you're going, be well prepared!

old:
動物の牙や皮、肉に関しちゃ
リンウッドが一番さ！
ここの男は全員、狩りくらいはできるんだぜ
column2:
When it comes to animal tusks, hides and meat
Lynnwood is the best!
All the men here can at least hunt!

old:
こないだ、リザードマンに
ケツをかじられちまってよ！
いやぁまいったまいった
column2:
The other day, I got my ass chewed out by a Lizardman
!
Well, that's good, that's good, that's good.
